name: PicoPico
description:
Pico Pico // ピコピコ is the Japanese onomatopoeia for typing on a keyboard. That's what this game is all about.

You take your best friend, or your dog next to you, and play on split keyboard to have an epic battle.

Every 30 seconds the level changes and another color has to be discovered.

Made for Oujevipo Contest #2 : KIDS
